props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS class names to apply to the breadcrumbs container

props.name: children
props.description: Breadcrumb items to render. Each item should be a Breadcrumbs.Item component.

props.name: overflow
props.description: How to handle overflow when breadcrumbs don't fit in the container. 'wrap' allows items to wrap to new lines, 'menu' collapses items into an overflow menu.

props.name: hideRoot
props.description: When using overflow='menu', whether to prioritize hiding the root (first) item when space is limited. If false, the root item will be kept visible when possible.

props.name: sx
props.description: System styles (deprecated, use CSS classes instead)

props.name: selected
props.description: Whether this item represents the current page. Sets aria-current='page' for accessibility.

props.name: to
props.description: Used when the item is rendered using a component like React Router's `Link`. The path to navigate to.

props.name: href
props.description: The URL that the breadcrumb item links to. Used with regular anchor elements.

props.name: children
props.description: The content to display inside the breadcrumb item, typically text.
